about.details:
Sagility India Limited, formerly known as Berkmeer India Private Limited, provides healthcare-focused solutions and services to Payers (US health insurers who fund and reimburse the cost of healthcare services) and Providers (primarily hospitals, physicians, diagnostics and medical technology companies).

The company supports the core business of both payers and providers. Services to payers span their entire operational spectrum, including centralized claims administration and clinical services functions. These include claims administration, payment integrity, clinical management and other services. For providers, the company offers revenue cycle management services to assist them in managing their billing and claiming treatment costs from payers. In addition, the Company also offers some of the services it provides to Payers to Pharmacy Benefit Managers (“PBMs”) who manage prescription drug coverage for members (i.e., insureds) under health benefit plans.

The company's customers are all based in the USA. As of March 31, 2024, the Company's five largest customer groups (i.e. the customer companies together with their subsidiaries) had an average tenure of service of 17 years. In January 2024, the company served five of the ten largest payers in the US (source: Everest Report). In addition, the company acquired 20 new customers in the financial years 2024 and 2023.

As of March 31, 2024, Sagility India had 35,044 employees, of which 60.52% were women. As of March 31, 2024, 1,687 of the employees held certifications, including 374 certified medical coders, 1,280 registered nurses in the US, Philippines and India, and 33 employees with other degrees such as dentistry, surgery and pharmacy.

faqs.question: What is the Sagility India IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sagility India IPO is a main-board IPO of 702199262 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2,106.60 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹30 per share. The minimum order quantity is 500.

The IPO opens on November 5, 2024, and closes on November 7, 2024.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sagility India IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sagility India IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sagility India IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sagility India IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sagility India IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sagility India IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sagility India IPO opens on November 5, 2024 and closes on November 7, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sagility India IPO?
faqs.answer: Sagility India IPO lot size is 500, and the minimum amount required is ₹15,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sagility India IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sagility India IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sagility India IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sagility India IPO will be done on Friday, November 8, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, November 11, 2024. Check the Sagility India IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sagility India IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sagility India IPO listing date is on Tuesday, November 12, 2024.
